post: I know that a lot of people roll their eyes at the re weave theory because of the idea of experts somehow missing it. However, Marino responded to Madame Flury Lemburg (who claimed this herself) and explained that unless one was specifically looking for a French Invisible Re weave they were unlikely to find it. He backed this up with multiple authorities who explained the technique and how it is difficult to spot. I can’t seem to find it on Shroud.com, but I have it on my laptop so I’ll be able to link it to you at some point..
